experience.description: ● Performed code optimizations, resulting in a 10% improvement in website performance and responsiveness.● Successfully integrated RESTful APIs, improving data communication efficiency and reducing data retrieval time by 15%.● Collaborated in code reviews, resulting in a 20% increase in code quality metrics and maintainability.● Spearheaded the implementation of frontend frameworks such as React.js and Angular.js, resulting in a 30% improvement in overall website functionality and a 20% increase in user interactivity.

projects: [{"title":"Chat-App","start_date":"Dec 2023","end_date":"Jan 2024","description":"Designed and implemented a cutting-edge chat application using the MERN(MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack, providing users with aseamless and responsive real-time communication experience.• Leveraged socket.io to create a robust and efficient messaging system, ensuringinstant message delivery and enhancing the overall user engagement• Implemented real-time features such as typing indicators and instantnotifications, enhancing the interactivity and user-friendliness of the chatapplication.• Implemented a comprehensive logging and error-handling system to monitorand troubleshoot issues effectively, resulting in a more stable and resilient chatplatform"},{"title":"ECOMMERCE WEBSITE","start_date":"Jul 2023","end_date":"Sep 2023","description":"A dynamic e-commerce platform using MERN stack.
